snippet.title: Flight simulators used by enthusiasts worldwide
snippet.description: Malaysian authorities have asked the FBI to help analyze data from a flight simulator found at the home of Zaharie Ahmad Shah, the Malaysia Airlines pilot whose plane has been missing since March 8. WHAT'S A FLIGHT SIMULATOR? The purpose of a flight simulator is to recreate

snippet.title: Milwaukee to host Navy Week celebration
snippet.description: The Navy is coming to Milwaukee for a Navy Week celebration in June. As part of Navy Week, the Blue Angels precision flight team will perform at the Milwaukee Air & Water Show June 12 and 13. The U.S. Navy schedules about 20 Navy Weeks each year

snippet.title: Fast-growth, vet-owned firms to make presentations
snippet.description: Eight high-growth companies founded by military veterans will make presentations next week at an event sponsored by VETransfer, a nonprofit organization that helps veterans start companies. Eight high-growth companies founded by military veterans will make presentations next week at an event sponsored by VETransfer, a nonprofit organization that helps veterans

snippet.title: At EAA AirVenture, inventors look for funding to attain liftoff | Convention is an ideal environment for inventions to find investors
snippet.description: To get his idea off the ground, pilot instructor and inventor Chris Johnson is looking for seed funding — which is why he was at EAA AirVenture. Oshkosh — The Wright Brothers didn't have angel investors or seed funding. But it's a much different world now for
